text: I had an exceptional shopping experience at Gucci Paragon , thanks to (Emily) the best sales lady. She was incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and attentive to my needs, making the entire process smooth and enjoyable. Her professionalism and warm demeanor truly stood out, ensuring I found exactly what I was looking for. She went above and beyond to provide excellent customer service, making me feel valued as a customer. I highly recommend seeking her out for a luxury shopping experience that exceeds expectations.

The sales staff Lucy Mu was attentive and sweet to answer all my queries. Especially now, there is a Doraemon collaboration.
Good effort from her.

Location at level 1 of Paragon.
Quite spacious. Had 2 levels

Store design was as expected of a high end store. Well decorated and classy.

Bags, belts, ready to wear, shoes.
All look so nice. Just need the wallet to be fatter a bit, to buy.

Strongly recommended!
